item.title: Setup TFC workspace
item.description: Export Terraform Config Location export TERRAFORM_CONFIG="$HOME/.terraform.d/credentials.tfrc.json" Setup Terraform workspace Change directory to the module root directory. cd terraform-aws-vpc/ Change to setup_workspace directory cd setup_workspace. Init terraform Run to following commands in order: terraform init Expected output: Creating a TFC Workspace terraform apply -var-file="$HOME/environment/terraform.tfvars". Enter yes when prompted for input Expected output: Change to the deploy folder cd ../deploy Deploys into the TFC Workspace terraform apply -auto-approve
